actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that intangible drilling and development costs will not be treated as an item of tax preference for purposes of the minimum tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions listing intangible drilling costs made in connection with oil, gas, and geothermal resources development as a tax preference item for purposes of the minimum tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that intangible drilling and development costs will not be treated as an item of tax preference for purposes of the minimum tax.
